entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
